product_name: Mountain Hardwear Warlow Hybrid Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: Built for those seeking the ultimate in lightweight durability, the Mountain Hardwear Warlow Hybrid pants with 32 in. inseam are ready to go the distance as you reach higher and go farther. Tough, durable nylon with a touch of stretch protects against the elements and promotes free range of motion. Reinforced, articulated knees and scuff guards at cuffs add durability to vulnerable areas. Mountain Hardwear Warlow Hybrid pants feature 2 zippered hand pockets for easy, secure storage.
short_description: Built for those seeking the ultimate in lightweight durability, the Mountain Hardwear Warlow Hybrid pants with 32 in. inseam are ready to go the distance as you reach higher and go farther.
